languages.text: Насилие расцвело в колонии. Вера сподвигает людей на суровые расправы как над окружающими, так и над самими собой.
Violence thrives in the colony. Their faith drives people to commit brutal acts against both others and themselves.
languages.original_text: Насилие расцвело в колонии. Вера сподвигает людей на суровые расправы как над окружающими, так и над самими собой.

traits.locale_text: Violence thrives in the colony. The faith drives people to commit brutalities against both others and themselves.

Violence thrives in the colony. Their faith drives people to commit brutal acts against both others and themselves.

languages.text: La violencia medra en la colonia. La fe inspira a la gente a cometer actos brutales contra los demás y contra sí misma.
languages.original_text: Violence thrives in the colony. Their faith drives people to commit brutal acts against both others and themselves.

traits.locale_text: La violencia medra en la colonia. La fe inspira a la gente a cometer actos brutales contra los demás y contra sí misma.

languages.text: La violence se répand comme une traînée de poudre dans la colonie. La foi des habitants les pousse à commettre toutes sortes d'actes barbares à l'encontre d'autrui et d'eux-mêmes.
languages.original_text: Violence thrives in the colony. Their faith drives people to commit brutal acts against both others and themselves.

traits.locale_text: La violence se répand comme une traînée de poudre dans la colonie. La foi des habitants les pousse à commettre toutes sortes d'actes barbares à l'encontre d'autrui et d'eux-mêmes.

languages.text: 殖民地的暴力活动愈演愈烈。人民的邪恶信仰驱使他们对自己和他人做出残忍的行径。
languages.original_text: Violence thrives in the colony. Their faith drives people to commit brutal acts against both others and themselves.

traits.locale_text: 殖民地的暴力活动愈演愈烈。人民的邪恶信仰驱使他们对自己和他人做出残忍的行径。

languages.text: コロニーでは暴力が盛んだ。彼らの信仰が、人々を他者に対しても自分自身に対しても残忍な行為に駆り立てるのだ。
languages.original_text: Violence thrives in the colony. Their faith drives people to commit brutal acts against both others and themselves.

traits.locale_text: コロニーでは暴力が盛んだ。彼らの信仰が、人々を他者に対しても自分自身に対しても残忍な行為に駆り立てるのだ。

languages.text: Die Gewalt floriert in der Kolonie. Ihr Glaube treibt die Leute zu brutalen Handlungen gegen andere und gegen sich selbst.
languages.original_text: Violence thrives in the colony. Their faith drives people to commit brutal acts against both others and themselves.

traits.locale_text: Die Gewalt floriert in der Kolonie. Ihr Glaube treibt die Leute zu brutalen Handlungen gegen andere und gegen sich selbst.

languages.text: Kolonide şiddet eylemleri gitgide artıyor. İnançlarıyla güdülen insanlar, başkalarına ve kendilerine feci şeyler yapıyor.
languages.original_text: Violence thrives in the colony. Their faith drives people to commit brutal acts against both others and themselves.
